headline: Assessing Netflix (NFLX) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback And Long Term Return Strength
summary: Netflix (NFLX) has recently drawn attention as investors weigh its share price near US$88 against fundamentals such as US$43.38b in revenue and US$10.43b in net income, alongside mixed short and longer term return figures. See our latest analysis for Netflix. The recent 90 day share price return of a 29.11% decline and 30 day share price return of a 6.77% decline contrast with a 1 year total shareholder return of 2.55% and a 3 year total shareholder return of 146.21%. This suggests that...
